pages.text: Comparators can detect working status of stew pots. Working pots has a fixed output 0, while idle ones outputs 1. Furthermore, each bowl of stew and each ingredient stack in the pot increase output signal by 1.
$(l:resting/oil)Gravy boats$(/l) can also be detected using comparators. Each remaining use time increases output signal by 3, while empty ones send 0.

Like pots, pans can also send signals through comparators indicating their working status, with 0 for working and 1 for being idle. Each ingredient stack will increase the output signal by 1. Specially, if the output slot is occupied, it constantly output 15.
Placed dishes and soups send 15 if it is not yet consumed, while the empty bowls and plates will send 0.
$(l:intro/wolf_statue)Wolf statues$(/l) send signals of 3 or 6 based on temperature. If heated by stoves, the output signal would be increased by 9.
